mapper.select:
with temp as(
select adrds.group_id, adrds.hos_id, adrds.copy_code, adrds.dis_r_no , adrds.ass_card_no, adrds.dispose_income, adrds.dispose_cost, adrds.dispose_tax, acs.price, acs.depre_money, acs.cur_money, acs.fore_money, acs.in_date, acs.ass_spec, acs.ass_mondl, acs.ass_brand, assd.ass_id, assd.ass_no, assd.ass_code, assd.ass_name, atd.ass_type_id, atd.ass_type_code, atd.ass_type_name, to_char(adrs.create_date ,'yyyyMM') year_month, adrs.dispose_type , adt.dispose_type_name , '02' naturs_code , '专用设备' naturs_name , acs.location , acs.store_id , acs.store_no , hsd.store_code , hsd.store_name , acs.dept_id , acs.dept_no , hdd.dept_code , hdd.dept_name , adrs.create_emp , su1.user_name create_emp_name, adrs.create_date , adrs.audit_emp , su2.user_name audit_emp_name, adrs.apply_date , adrs.state ,
su2.user_name confirm_emp_name, adrs.apply_date confirm_date , adrds.note
from ASS_DISPOSAL_R_DETAIL_SPECIAL adrds left join ASS_DISPOSAL_R_SPECIAL adrs on adrds.group_id = adrs.group_id and adrds.hos_id = adrs.hos_id and adrds.copy_code = adrs.copy_code and adrds.dis_r_no = adrs.dis_r_no left join ASS_DISPOSE_TYPE adt on adrs.dispose_type = adt.dispose_type_code left join sys_user su1 on adrs.group_id = su1.group_id and adrs.hos_id = su1.hos_id and adrs.create_emp = su1.user_id and su1.is_stop = 0 left join sys_user su2 on adrs.group_id = su2.group_id and adrs.hos_id = su2.hos_id and adrs.audit_emp = su2.user_id and su1.is_stop = 0 left join ass_card_special acs on adrds.group_id = acs.group_id and adrds.hos_id = acs.hos_id and adrds.copy_code = acs.copy_code and adrds.ass_card_no = acs.ass_card_no
left join ass_no_dict assd on acs.group_id = assd.group_id and acs.hos_id = assd.hos_id and acs.copy_code = assd.copy_code and acs.ass_id = assd.ass_id and acs.ass_no = assd.ass_no
left join ass_type_dict atd on assd.group_id = atd.group_id and assd.hos_id = atd.hos_id and assd.copy_code = atd.copy_code and assd.ass_type_id = atd.ass_type_id
left join hos_store_dict hsd on acs.group_id = hsd.group_id and acs.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and acs.store_id = hsd.store_id and hsd.is_stop = 0 left join hos_dept_dict hdd on acs.group_id = hdd.group_id and acs.hos_id = hdd.hos_id and acs.dept_id = hdd.dept_id and hdd.is_stop = 0 where adrs.state = 2 AND adrds.group_id = ${group_id} AND adrds.hos_id = ${hos_id} AND adrds.copy_code = ${copy_code} union all
select adrdg.group_id, adrdg.hos_id, adrdg.copy_code, adrdg.dis_r_no , adrdg.ass_card_no, adrdg.dispose_income, adrdg.dispose_cost, adrdg.dispose_tax, acg.price, acg.depre_money, acg.cur_money, acg.fore_money, acg.in_date, acg.ass_spec, acg.ass_mondl, acg.ass_brand, assd.ass_id, assd.ass_no, assd.ass_code, assd.ass_name, atd.ass_type_id, atd.ass_type_code, atd.ass_type_name, to_char(adrg.create_date ,'yyyyMM') year_month, adrg.dispose_type , adt.dispose_type_name , '03' naturs_code , '一般设备' naturs_name , acg.location , acg.store_id , acg.store_no , hsd.store_code , hsd.store_name , acg.dept_id , acg.dept_no , hdd.dept_code , hdd.dept_name , adrg.create_emp , su1.user_name create_emp_name, adrg.create_date , adrg.audit_emp , su2.user_name audit_emp_name, adrg.apply_date , adrg.state ,
su2.user_name confirm_emp_name, adrg.apply_date confirm_date , adrdg.note
from ASS_DISPOSAL_R_DETAIL_GENERAL adrdg left join ASS_DISPOSAL_R_GENERAL adrg on adrdg.group_id = adrg.group_id and adrdg.hos_id = adrg.hos_id and adrdg.copy_code = adrg.copy_code and adrdg.dis_r_no = adrg.dis_r_no left join ASS_DISPOSE_TYPE adt on adrg.dispose_type = adt.dispose_type_code left join sys_user su1 on adrg.group_id = su1.group_id and adrg.hos_id = su1.hos_id and adrg.create_emp = su1.user_id and su1.is_stop = 0 left join sys_user su2 on adrg.group_id = su2.group_id and adrg.hos_id = su2.hos_id and adrg.audit_emp = su2.user_id and su1.is_stop = 0 left join ass_card_general acg on adrdg.group_id = acg.group_id and adrdg.hos_id = acg.hos_id and adrdg.copy_code = acg.copy_code and adrdg.ass_card_no = acg.ass_card_no
left join ass_no_dict assd on acg.group_id = assd.group_id and acg.hos_id = assd.hos_id and acg.copy_code = assd.copy_code and acg.ass_id = assd.ass_id and acg.ass_no = assd.ass_no
left join ass_type_dict atd on assd.group_id = atd.group_id and assd.hos_id = atd.hos_id and assd.copy_code = atd.copy_code and assd.ass_type_id = atd.ass_type_id
left join hos_store_dict hsd on acg.group_id = hsd.group_id and acg.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and acg.store_id = hsd.store_id and hsd.is_stop = 0 left join hos_dept_dict hdd on acg.group_id = hdd.group_id and acg.hos_id = hdd.hos_id and acg.dept_id = hdd.dept_id and hdd.is_stop = 0 where adrg.state = 2 AND adrdg.group_id = ${group_id} AND adrdg.hos_id = ${hos_id} AND adrdg.copy_code = ${copy_code} union all
select adrdh.group_id, adrdh.hos_id, adrdh.copy_code, adrdh.dis_r_no , adrdh.ass_card_no, adrdh.dispose_income, adrdh.dispose_cost, adrdh.dispose_tax, ach.price, ach.depre_money, ach.cur_money, ach.fore_money, ach.in_date, null ass_spec, null ass_mondl, null ass_brand, assd.ass_id, assd.ass_no, assd.ass_code, assd.ass_name, atd.ass_type_id, atd.ass_type_code, atd.ass_type_name, to_char(adrh.create_date ,'yyyyMM') year_month, adrh.dispose_type , adt.dispose_type_name , '01' naturs_code , '房屋及建筑' naturs_name , ach.location , 0 store_id , 0 store_no , '' store_code , '' store_name , ach.dept_id , ach.dept_no , hdd.dept_code , hdd.dept_name , adrh.create_emp , su1.user_name create_emp_name, adrh.create_date , adrh.audit_emp , su2.user_name audit_emp_name, adrh.apply_date , adrh.state ,
su2.user_name confirm_emp_name, adrh.apply_date confirm_date , adrdh.note
from ASS_DISPOSAL_R_DETAIL_HOUSE adrdh left join ASS_DISPOSAL_R_HOUSE adrh on adrdh.group_id = adrh.group_id and adrdh.hos_id = adrh.hos_id and adrdh.copy_code = adrh.copy_code and adrdh.dis_r_no = adrh.dis_r_no left join ASS_DISPOSE_TYPE adt on adrh.dispose_type = adt.dispose_type_code left join sys_user su1 on adrh.group_id = su1.group_id and adrh.hos_id = su1.hos_id and adrh.create_emp = su1.user_id and su1.is_stop = 0 left join sys_user su2 on adrh.group_id = su2.group_id and adrh.hos_id = su2.hos_id and adrh.audit_emp = su2.user_id and su1.is_stop = 0 left join ass_card_HOUSE ach on adrdh.group_id = ach.group_id and adrdh.hos_id = ach.hos_id and adrdh.copy_code = ach.copy_code and adrdh.ass_card_no = ach.ass_card_no
left join ass_no_dict assd on ach.group_id = assd.group_id and ach.hos_id = assd.hos_id and ach.copy_code = assd.copy_code and ach.ass_id = assd.ass_id and ach.ass_no = assd.ass_no
left join ass_type_dict atd on assd.group_id = atd.group_id and assd.hos_id = atd.hos_id and assd.copy_code = atd.copy_code and assd.ass_type_id = atd.ass_type_id
left join hos_dept_dict hdd on ach.group_id = hdd.group_id and ach.hos_id = hdd.hos_id and ach.dept_id = hdd.dept_id and hdd.is_stop = 0 where adrh.state = 2 AND adrdh.group_id = ${group_id} AND adrdh.hos_id = ${hos_id} AND adrdh.copy_code = ${copy_code} union all
select adrdo.group_id, adrdo.hos_id, adrdo.copy_code, adrdo.dis_r_no , adrdo.ass_card_no, adrdo.dispose_income, adrdo.dispose_cost, adrdo.dispose_tax, aco.price, aco.depre_money, aco.cur_money, aco.fore_money, aco.in_date, aco.ass_spec, aco.ass_mondl, aco.ass_brand, assd.ass_id, assd.ass_no, assd.ass_code, assd.ass_name, atd.ass_type_id, atd.ass_type_code, atd.ass_type_name, to_char(adro.create_date ,'yyyyMM') year_month, adro.dispose_type , adt.dispose_type_name , '04' naturs_code , '其他固定资产' naturs_name , aco.location , aco.store_id , aco.store_no , hsd.store_code , hsd.store_name , aco.dept_id , aco.dept_no , hdd.dept_code , hdd.dept_name , adro.create_emp , su1.user_name create_emp_name, adro.create_date , adro.audit_emp , su2.user_name audit_emp_name, adro.apply_date , adro.state ,
su2.user_name confirm_emp_name, adro.apply_date confirm_date , adrdo.note
from ASS_DISPOSAL_R_DETAIL_OTHER adrdo left join ASS_DISPOSAL_R_OTHER adro on adrdo.group_id = adro.group_id and adrdo.hos_id = adro.hos_id and adrdo.copy_code = adro.copy_code and adrdo.dis_r_no = adro.dis_r_no left join ASS_DISPOSE_TYPE adt on adro.dispose_type = adt.dispose_type_code left join sys_user su1 on adro.group_id = su1.group_id and adro.hos_id = su1.hos_id and adro.create_emp = su1.user_id and su1.is_stop = 0 left join sys_user su2 on adro.group_id = su2.group_id and adro.hos_id = su2.hos_id and adro.audit_emp = su2.user_id and su1.is_stop = 0 left join ass_card_other aco on adrdo.group_id = aco.group_id and adrdo.hos_id = aco.hos_id and adrdo.copy_code = aco.copy_code and adrdo.ass_card_no = aco.ass_card_no
left join ass_no_dict assd on aco.group_id = assd.group_id and aco.hos_id = assd.hos_id and aco.copy_code = assd.copy_code and aco.ass_id = assd.ass_id and aco.ass_no = assd.ass_no
left join ass_type_dict atd on assd.group_id = atd.group_id and assd.hos_id = atd.hos_id and assd.copy_code = atd.copy_code and assd.ass_type_id = atd.ass_type_id
left join hos_store_dict hsd on aco.group_id = hsd.group_id and aco.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and aco.store_id = hsd.store_id and hsd.is_stop = 0 left join hos_dept_dict hdd on aco.group_id = hdd.group_id and aco.hos_id = hdd.hos_id and aco.dept_id = hdd.dept_id and hdd.is_stop = 0 where adro.state = 2 AND adrdo.group_id = ${group_id} AND adrdo.hos_id = ${hos_id} AND adrdo.copy_code = ${copy_code} union all
select adrdi.group_id, adrdi.hos_id, adrdi.copy_code, adrdi.dis_r_no , adrdi.ass_card_no, adrdi.dispose_income, adrdi.dispose_cost, adrdi.dispose_tax, aci.price, aci.depre_money, aci.cur_money, aci.fore_money, aci.in_date, null ass_spec, null ass_mondl, aci.ass_brand, assd.ass_id, assd.ass_no, assd.ass_code, assd.ass_name, atd.ass_type_id, atd.ass_type_code, atd.ass_type_name, to_char(adri.create_date ,'yyyyMM') year_month, adri.dispose_type , adt.dispose_type_name , '05' naturs_code , '其他无形资产' naturs_name , aci.location , aci.store_id , aci.store_no , hsd.store_code , hsd.store_name , aci.dept_id , aci.dept_no , hdd.dept_code , hdd.dept_name , adri.create_emp , su1.user_name create_emp_name, adri.create_date , adri.audit_emp , su2.user_name audit_emp_name, adri.apply_date , adri.state ,
su2.user_name confirm_emp_name, adri.apply_date confirm_date , adrdi.note
from ASS_DISPOSAL_R_DETAIL_INASSET adrdi left join ASS_DISPOSAL_R_INASSETS adri on adrdi.group_id = adri.group_id and adrdi.hos_id = adri.hos_id and adrdi.copy_code = adri.copy_code and adrdi.dis_r_no = adri.dis_r_no left join ASS_DISPOSE_TYPE adt on adri.dispose_type = adt.dispose_type_code left join sys_user su1 on adri.group_id = su1.group_id and adri.hos_id = su1.hos_id and adri.create_emp = su1.user_id and su1.is_stop = 0 left join sys_user su2 on adri.group_id = su2.group_id and adri.hos_id = su2.hos_id and adri.audit_emp = su2.user_id and su1.is_stop = 0 left join ass_card_inassets aci on adrdi.group_id = aci.group_id and adrdi.hos_id = aci.hos_id and adrdi.copy_code = aci.copy_code and adrdi.ass_card_no = aci.ass_card_no
left join ass_no_dict assd on aci.group_id = assd.group_id and aci.hos_id = assd.hos_id and aci.copy_code = assd.copy_code and aci.ass_id = assd.ass_id and aci.ass_no = assd.ass_no
left join ass_type_dict atd on assd.group_id = atd.group_id and assd.hos_id = atd.hos_id and assd.copy_code = atd.copy_code and assd.ass_type_id = atd.ass_type_id
left join hos_store_dict hsd on aci.group_id = hsd.group_id and aci.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and aci.store_id = hsd.store_id and hsd.is_stop = 0 left join hos_dept_dict hdd on aci.group_id = hdd.group_id and aci.hos_id = hdd.hos_id and aci.dept_id = hdd.dept_id and hdd.is_stop = 0 where adri.state = 2 AND adrdi.group_id = ${group_id} AND adrdi.hos_id = ${hos_id} AND adrdi.copy_code = ${copy_code} union all
select adrdl.group_id, adrdl.hos_id, adrdl.copy_code, adrdl.dis_r_no , adrdl.ass_card_no, adrdl.dispose_income, adrdl.dispose_cost, adrdl.dispose_tax, acl.price, acl.depre_money, acl.cur_money, acl.fore_money, acl.in_date, null ass_spec, null ass_mondl, null ass_brand, assd.ass_id, assd.ass_no, assd.ass_code, assd.ass_name, atd.ass_type_id, atd.ass_type_code, atd.ass_type_name, to_char(adrl.create_date ,'yyyyMM') year_month, adrl.dispose_type , adt.dispose_type_name , '06' naturs_code , '土地使用权' naturs_name , acl.location , 0 store_id , 0 store_no , '' store_code , '' store_name , acl.dept_id , acl.dept_no , hdd.dept_code , hdd.dept_name , adrl.create_emp , su1.user_name create_emp_name, adrl.create_date , adrl.audit_emp , su2.user_name audit_emp_name , adrl.apply_date , adrl.state ,
su2.user_name confirm_emp_name, adrl.apply_date confirm_date , adrdl.note
from ASS_DISPOSAL_R_DETAIL_Land adrdl left join ASS_DISPOSAL_R_Land adrl on adrdl.group_id = adrl.group_id and adrdl.hos_id = adrl.hos_id and adrdl.copy_code = adrl.copy_code and adrdl.dis_r_no = adrl.dis_r_no left join ASS_DISPOSE_TYPE adt on adrl.dispose_type = adt.dispose_type_code left join sys_user su1 on adrl.group_id = su1.group_id and adrl.hos_id = su1.hos_id and adrl.create_emp = su1.user_id and su1.is_stop = 0 left join sys_user su2 on adrl.group_id = su2.group_id and adrl.hos_id = su2.hos_id and adrl.audit_emp = su2.user_id and su1.is_stop = 0 left join ass_card_land acl on adrdl.group_id = acl.group_id and adrdl.hos_id = acl.hos_id and adrdl.copy_code = acl.copy_code and adrdl.ass_card_no = acl.ass_card_no
left join ass_no_dict assd on acl.group_id = assd.group_id and acl.hos_id = assd.hos_id and acl.copy_code = assd.copy_code and acl.ass_id = assd.ass_id and acl.ass_no = assd.ass_no
left join ass_type_dict atd on assd.group_id = atd.group_id and assd.hos_id = atd.hos_id and assd.copy_code = atd.copy_code and assd.ass_type_id = atd.ass_type_id
left join hos_dept_dict hdd on acl.group_id = hdd.group_id and acl.hos_id = hdd.hos_id and acl.dept_id = hdd.dept_id and hdd.is_stop = 0 where adrl.state = 2 AND adrdl.group_id = ${group_id} AND adrdl.hos_id = ${hos_id} AND adrdl.copy_code = ${copy_code} ) select * from ( select * from temp t where t.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND to_number(t.year_month) >= to_number(#{year_month_beg})
AND to_number(t.year_month) <= to_number(#{year_month_end})
AND t.dis_r_no like '${ass_dis_no}%'
AND t.naturs_code = #{ass_nature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND t.dispose_type = #{bus_type_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND t.store_id = #{store_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND t.dept_id = #{dept_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
union all
select null group_id, null hos_id, null copy_code, null dis_r_no , null ass_card_no, sum(t.dispose_income) dispose_income, sum(t.dispose_cost) dispose_cost, sum(t.dispose_tax) dispose_tax, sum(t.price) price, sum(t.depre_money) depre_money, sum(t.cur_money) cur_money, sum(t.fore_money) fore_money, null in_date, null ass_spec, null ass_mondl, null ass_brand, null ass_id, null ass_no, null ass_code, null ass_name, null ass_type_id, null ass_type_code, null ass_type_name, '合计' year_month, null dispose_type , null dispose_type_name , null naturs_code , null naturs_name , null location , null store_id , null store_no , null store_code , null store_name , null dept_id , null dept_no , null dept_code , null dept_name , null create_emp , null create_emp_name, null create_date , null audit_emp , null audit_emp_name , null apply_date , null state ,
null confirm_emp_name, null confirm_date , null note from temp t where t.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND to_number(t.year_month) >= to_number(#{year_month_beg})
AND to_number(t.year_month) <= to_number(#{year_month_end})
AND t.dis_r_no like '${ass_dis_no}%'
AND t.naturs_code = #{ass_nature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND t.dispose_type = #{bus_type_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND t.store_id = #{store_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND t.dept_id = #{dept_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
) tt
order by tt.ass_code
